mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... Designed in 1921 by Ralph Adams Cram in his signature Collegiate Gothic style, it was built by the university between 1924 and 1928 at a cost of $2.3 million..." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princeton_University_Chapel "... The chapel was rededicated in an interfaith ceremony in 2002 following a major two-year restoration..." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princeton_University_Chapel [work]
